forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 44F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
